description: This table contains information for a single NDC code on a pharmacy claim.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record

columns.name: NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NDC_UNIT_EXT_CODE_LST_ID
columns.description: Units (ml, units, etc.). The unit code can be retrieved by joining this column to the EXT_COSE_LST_ID column in FCL_EXTRNL_CDE_LST table.

columns.name: NDC_UNIT_EXT_CODE_LST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: FILL_NUMBER
columns.description: Indicates whether the prescription is an original (0) or a refill (1,2,...).

columns.name: DAYS_SUPPLY
columns.description: Estimated number of days the prescription will last.

columns.name: DAW_CODE_EXT_CODE_LST_ID
columns.description: Code indicating whether or not the prescriber's instructions regarding generic substitution were followed. The Dispense As Written (DAW) code can be retrieved by joining this column to the EXT_COSE_LST_ID column in FCL_EXTRNL_CDE_LST table.

columns.name: DAW_CODE_EXT_CODE_LST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: OTHER_AMT_RECOGNIZED
columns.description: Total amount recognized by the processor of any payment from another source.

columns.name: FILL_DATE
columns.description: Identifies date the prescription was filled.

columns.name: OWNING_SAPBS_POS_ID
columns.description: Business segment ID that owns the claim record.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Place of service type


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

Office

columns.name: PRIM_INS_AMT
columns.description: Sum of all the insurance amount paid by previous payers.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The accounts payable claim to which this service line is associated.

columns.name: FILL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores information on whether the prescription was completely or partially filled.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Partially filled


Completely filled

columns.name: POS_TYPE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Source of the Place of Service type


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Profile


User


Batch Type Definition

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Chronicles special item. This is the soft-delete flag that will be set to the appropriate record status option when the record is soft-deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: PRESC_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the prescribing provider record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: SERV_PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the service pharmacy record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the RX_PHR table.
